response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and functionality. Given its quality and the effort put into it, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering the value it can bring to you, I am offering it to you for $125. I trust this price reflects the true worth of the product and provides you with an opportunity to experience its benefits without breaking the bank. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 125}
